description: The database id for this table
The name of the indicator (title of chart)
The text that will show up at the bottom of the chart
The order within the category that the indicator will appear
String literal of the available types: ['count', 'percentage', 'rate', 'median', 'index', 'average']
If the indicator_type is 'rate', the size the universe is scaled to
A formatting string for displaying the indicator value. See code for examples
The id for the category where this indicator is found.
